fileUpload.title: Drop your file here
fileUpload.content: You can either drop your file here, or you can just click on this space

fileTooBig.title: File too big
fileTooBig.message: Your file is too big! Maximum size is {size}MB

default.title: Error
default.message:
There was an unexpected error on the server side!
Would you mind trying that again?

ProcessDeploymentFailedException.title: Process deployment failed!
ProcessDeploymentFailedException.message: There was some problem with your deployment. Please check whether it has *.bpmn or *.bpmn20.xml extension and a valid syntax.

ZipFileHasNoProcessesException.title: Processes archive deployment failed!
ZipFileHasNoProcessesException.message: We couldn't deploy any of the processes supplied in your archive. Please check it and try again.

ProcessDefinitionDoesntExistsException.title: Processes definition doesn't exist!
ProcessDefinitionDoesntExistsException.message: We couldn't find process definition you were asking for. Could you try again?

AccessDeniedException.title: You can't see this page!
AccessDeniedException.message: You have no rights to see chosen page.

DeploymentTooBigException.title: Deployment file exceeds maximum size!
DeploymentTooBigException.message: Your deployment cannot be deployed because of it's size. Maximum deployment size is 3MB.

ClaimForbiddenException.title: You cannot claim this task!
ClaimForbiddenException.message: You are not a candidate for claiming this task.

AssignmentAlreadyExistsException.title: You cannot add this user to chosen group
AssignmentAlreadyExistsException.message: This user is already member of the chosen group

WrongPasswordException.title: Passwords don't match
WrongPasswordException.message: The password you supplied doesn't match the password stored in the database

UserAlreadyExistsException.title: User with such id already exists
UserAlreadyExistsException.message: There is already user registered with the same id

NoSuchGroupException.title: There is no group with this id
NoSuchGroupException.message: We couldn't find the group with a given id

NoSuchProcessException.title: There is no process with this id
NoSuchProcessException.message: We couldn't find the process with a given id

EmptyDeploymentException.title: Deployed process has no data
EmptyDeploymentException.message: It seems, that your process is empty. Could you check again?

GroupAlreadyExistsException.title: Group with such id already exists
GroupAlreadyExistsException.message: There is already group registered with the same id

NoSuchUserException.title: There is no user with this id
NoSuchUserException.message: We couldn't find the user with a given id

NoSuchTaskException.title: There is no task with this id
NoSuchTaskException.message: We couldn't find the task with a given id

UnclaimForbiddenException.title: You cannot unclaim this task!
UnclaimForbiddenException.message: You are not assigned to this task or you were not a candidate for claiming it.

ProcessStartForbiddenException.title: You cannot start this process!
ProcessStartForbiddenException.message: You are not a candidate for starting this process

NoSuchAssignmentException.title: You cannot remove this user from chosen group
NoSuchAssignmentException.message: This user is not a member of the chosen group
